column1: Skin-changers were creatures who could take different forms at will. Little is known of their abilities; the only famous skin-changers were Beorn and his Beornings (who could take the shape of a Men or of a bear)
column3: passim but evidently other skin-changers also existed.

column1: It has been suggested that Radagast
column3: was able to change his form.http://forums.theonering.com/viewtopic.php?t=38698 Radagast: master of shapes and hues Forum discussion
